S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-3303: Fix OrderByColumn.java to account for "pulled" GROUP BY columns when a) checking to see if the user has specified a valid ORDER BY column, and b) trying to resolve "pulled" ORDER BY columns to their underlying values. Also, add some relevant test cases to the existing lang/orderby.sql test.
Port to 10.3 using "d3303_10_3_merge.patch" as attached to the Jira. No additional changes were necessary.
